channel.title: Dustinsworld [317] Dodian Based
channel.description:
Alright so I wanted to make a source that was worth playing, not 5 minutes and your maxed out. This is my server, all coded by me. Dodian source. Im trying to keep the server original, which means no custom items like "Lava Armour". Because that's just gay :). I want my server to be one of its own, not a copy of a devo source. I got this as a response to my server. I think Im doing pretty good. This is my first source that i've coded. Im just learning as I go.
Yousir, are a beast! this server is the best ive seen in a while, its non leeched etc. I should Rep+ u just for that. I can see your quite new so enjoy your stay here on ****** and nice server good day sir.
[b]I coded this my self, this was a devolution 7 source.[/b] I give Credit to Dodian/Winten for using his source, I just changed alot. Some Things I did -All working skills -All npcs have drops/spawn times -Godswords/Bandos -Working abby rift. -Gem Crafting -Working Slayer (Still need to add tasks) -Server is stable -Gave items a requirements -Magic works properly ( You could attack a slayer monster without having the slayer level.) -Npcs will attack back -Falador is the Home Area. -Fully working Karamja -Working Fishing Guild -Custom Barrows Things I still need to fix -Mining you have to keep clicking to mine. -Adding Slayer tasks -Agility bugs/Dcing -Redo Farming -Redo Herblore -Add a mini game? Maybe Pest control or something. Basicly the server is ready to go, I just need to make some skills more realistic. [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/11t3okm.jpg[/img] **Cick on ladder to enter Slayer Cave. [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2rfxxcy.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/flv7eg.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/312isnn.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/fdrmut.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2czzucx.jpg[/img] All working rifts, each rune works! [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/op3ayo.jpg[/img] Firemaking is more realistic! [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/303aiow.jpg[/img] 100% Working Gem Crafting [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/214w9ia.jpg[/img] Leave a comment? Thanks :)

item.title: Dustinsworld [317] Dodian Based
item.dc:creator: @N0valpk N0valpk
item.description:
@N0valpk wrote:

Alright so I wanted to make a source that was worth playing, not 5 minutes and your maxed out.
This is my server, all coded by me. Dodian source.
Im trying to keep the server original, which means no custom items like “Lava Armour”. Because that’s just gay :).
I want my server to be one of its own, not a copy of a devo source.

I got this as a response to my server. I think Im doing pretty good. This is my first source that i’ve coded. Im just learning as I go.

Yousir, are a beast! this server is the best ive seen in a while, its non leeched etc.

I should Rep+ u just for that.
I can see your quite new
so enjoy your stay here on ******
and nice server
good day sir.

I coded this my self, this was a devolution 7 source.

I give Credit to Dodian/Winten for using his source, I just changed alot.

Some Things I did
-All working skills
-All npcs have drops/spawn times
-Godswords/Bandos
-Working abby rift.
-Gem Crafting
-Working Slayer (Still need to add tasks)
-Server is stable
-Gave items a requirements
-Magic works properly ( You could attack a slayer monster without having the slayer level.)
-Npcs will attack back
-Falador is the Home Area.
-Fully working Karamja
-Working Fishing Guild
-Custom Barrows

Things I still need to fix
-Mining you have to keep clicking to mine.
-Adding Slayer tasks
-Agility bugs/Dcing
-Redo Farming
-Redo Herblore
-Add a mini game? Maybe Pest control or something.

Basicly the server is ready to go, I just need to make some skills more realistic.

**Cick on ladder to enter Slayer Cave.





All working rifts, each rune works!

Firemaking is more realistic!

100% Working Gem Crafting

Leave a comment? Thanks

Read full topic
